subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Johan Franzen scored on consecutive shots in the third period to end Brian Elliott’s shutout streak and Todd Bertuzzi netted the lone goal in a shootout as the Red Wings rallied to beat the Blues, 3-2.
snippet: Johan Franzen scored on consecutive shots in the third period to end Brian Elliott’s shutout streak and Todd Bertuzzi netted the lone goal in a shootout as the Red Wings rallied to beat the Blues, 3-2.
